replies.body: Why do you need to tell people to stop feeding?  Do you think they don't already know that when they see the gray screen all the time?  Did you get annoyed by their constant death?  That's an emotion.  Don't get emotional and tell people to stop feeding (99.9% they already know it) and you won't run into those problem (at least not caused by you).  It's not helpful, provides zero useful advice, and just cause problems all because you got emotionally annoyed at them.  Play your own game and if you want them to stop, actually provide useful advice and don't be a dick about it.

It's hard to convince someone to play passive farm. It is very boring.

I suppose it's just something you learn to do when you are Garen against a competent Talon...
